perturbation.original_text: Franchisee agrees to pay all Royalties,  Advertising Fund Fees, amounts due Pretzel Time for purchases by Franchisee from Pretzel Time or its Affiliates and other amounts which  Franchisee  owes to Pretzel Time via  electronic  funds transfer from Franchisee's general account,  which shall be initiated by Pretzel Time and any transfer fees shall be paid by Franchisee  every  Wednesday for the preceding week based upon the Net Revenues.  Franchisee herein agrees to execute and complete all necessary  documentation required by Pretzel Time to permit the wire transfer to Pretzel Time (in the form attached  hereto as Exhibit E or such other form as Pretzel Time shall accept).
perturbation.changed_text: Franchisee agrees to pay all Royalties,  Advertising Fund Fees, amounts due Pretzel Time for purchases by Franchisee from Pretzel Time or its Affiliates and other amounts which  Franchisee  owes to Pretzel Time via electronic funds transfer from Franchisee's general account,  which shall be initiated by Pretzel Time and any transfer fees shall be paid by Franchisee every month based upon the Net Revenues.  Franchisee herein agrees to execute and complete all necessary  documentation required by Pretzel Time to permit the wire transfer to Pretzel Time (in the form attached  hereto as Exhibit E or such other form as Pretzel Time shall accept).
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the payment should be every Wednesday. The changed text now states payment is every month, creating contradiction and uncertainty in the payment schedule.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract, possible violation of financial regulations if not clearly defined.

perturbation.original_text: Upon the expiration of the initial term of this  Agreement,  Franchisee shall  have the one time  right to obtain a  successor  franchise  to  operate a Pretzel  Time Unit at the Site (a  "Successor  Franchise")  for a single term of five (5) years  immediately  following the expiration of the initial term of the Franchise upon giving Pretzel Time six (6) months notice prior to the expiration of the then current term if:
perturbation.changed_text: Upon the expiration of the initial term of this  Agreement,  Franchisee shall have the option to obtain a successor franchise to operate a Pretzel Time Unit at the Site (a "Successor Franchise") for a term to be determined by Pretzel Time immediately following the expiration of the initial term of the Franchise upon giving Pretzel Time six (6) months notice prior to the expiration of the then current term if:
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a successor franchise is for a term of five years. The changed text now states a term to be determined by Pretzel Time, creating a contradiction regarding the term length and uncertainty. This contradicts the franchisee's expectation based on the original terms.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract, Unconscionability, potentially violating franchise laws requiring clear and definite terms.

perturbation.original_text: The  Operations  Manual's  specifications,   standards,  and  operating procedures  communicated to Franchisee in writing shall be deemed a part of this Agreement and are  incorporated  herein by  reference.  Such  Operations  Manual provisions and all reasonable  modifications shall be binding upon Franchisee to the same extent as if set forth verbatim in this Franchise  Agreement,  and such provisions  may be  changed  from  time to time by  Pretzel  Time,  in its  sole discretion,  provided that changes are  reasonably  designed to enhance  Pretzel Time's  Products,  the Pretzel  Time  System,  or  franchise  operation  and are uniformly  applied  with  respect  to all  franchisees.
perturbation.changed_text: The  Operations  Manual's  specifications,   standards,  and  operating procedures communicated to Franchisee in writing shall be deemed a suggestion only, and are not incorporated herein. Such Operations Manual provisions and all modifications are at the discretion of the Franchisee. Pretzel Time may make suggestions but will not enforce
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated the Operations Manual is binding. The changed text states it is merely a suggestion and not binding. This completely contradicts the original intent and enforceability, creating a misaligned terminology.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract, undermines standardization requirements of franchise laws.
